title: I cant type in champ select
body:
I cant type in champion select or after game and i cant see my friend list. I send a ticket to riot support 10 days and they said they are working on that issue it stoped for a few days and then appeared again,my brother who is also in eune doesent have that problem.If somebody can help me i would be really happy .




I cant post this without a joke:
What did they use in medieval times to break castle walls?
A {{champion:55}} pult

replies.body:
It sounds like your network is having an issue maintaining a connection to the chat servers.  When you have some time, go over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up and strengthen your connection.  

Why does {{champion:157}} never get locked out?  

Because he always hasaki!

...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I dont think it is because of the network , my brother can type when he enters from the same pc
Also it says logging onto chat service

We'll need to take a closer look at this if the connection guide wasn't able to resolve this.  Reach out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can help further.  Gather the following set of logs which will help provide some more context to your specific case:

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

You'll be in good hands and we'll find some options best for you!
